segments.text: Would you please explain for me what a business contract implies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A contract is an agreement which is binding on both parties mutually . A contract might be formal or informal , oral or written . An implemented contract is one which has been fully executed by both sides ; an executive contract is one which is going to be performed . They are enforceable by laws and any party who defaults the contract may be sued and forced to make compensation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are the purposes of contract ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In an ordinary contract , the objective of a contract might be relatively simple , indicating the description of commodity , price , quantity , terms of payment and etc .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When we draft a contract , which points should we pay special attention to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . First , make meaning clear by using concise forma language . Second , describe accurately the exact requirement . Finally , state clearly the permissible variation in quantity .
segments.speaker: S2
